scripts.css:wp: npm run css:build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const header=fs.readFileSync('wp-content/themes/reduck-theme/style.css','utf8').split('*/')[0]+'*/\n\n'; const css=fs.readFileSync('src/assets/styles.compiled.css','utf8').replace(/url\(\"fonts\//g,'url(\"assets/fonts/'); fs.writeFileSync('wp-content/themes/reduck-theme/style.css',header+css);"
scripts.dev: npm run css:build && (npm run css:watch & eleventy --serve --watch)
